fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util

Class LocatedDeviceTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.util.LocatedDeviceTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer

    public class LocatedDeviceTracker
extends Object
implements LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer
    Utility class to track iCasa devices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocatedDeviceTracker

        public LocatedDeviceTracker(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context,
                    Class<? extends GenericDevice> clazz,
                    LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer customizer,
                    String... mandatoryProperties)
        Creates a LocatedDeviceTracker object on the specified class name. Services registered under the specified class name will be tracked by this LocatedDeviceTracker object.
        Parameters:
        context - the BundleContext object against which the tracking is done.
        clazz - the Class name of the services to be tracked.
        customizer - the customizer object to call when services are added, modified, or removed in this LocatedDeviceTracker object. If customizer is null, then this LocatedDeviceTracker object will be used as the TrackerCustomizer object and the LocatedDeviceTracker object will call the TrackerCustomizer methods on itself.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
        Opens this LocatedDeviceTracker object and begin tracking services.

        Services which match the search criteria specified when this LocatedDeviceTracker object was created are now tracked by this LocatedDeviceTracker object.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this LocatedDeviceTracker object.

        This method should be called when this LocatedDeviceTracker object should end the tracking of services.

      • addingDevice

        public boolean addingDevice(LocatedDevice device)
        Default implementation of the LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer.addingDevice method.
        Specified by:
        addingDevice in interface LocatedDeviceTrackerCustomizer
        Parameters:
        device - the device being added to the Tracker object.
        Returns:
        The service object to be tracked for the DeviceReference object or null if the DeviceReference object should not be tracked.
